Who is Ambitious People Group

Founded in 2007 Ambitious People Group has in a relatively short period of time grown into a extremely successful specialist recruitment consultancy currently employing almost 100 staff.

Under the Ambitious People Group umbrella we currently have three specialized recruitment brands:

• SAM Recruitment
Specialized in recruiting Sales and Marketing professionals, with offices in Amsterdam, Rotterdam and a satellite office in Antwerp.

• Ardekay
Specialized in IT recruitment within the architecture, design, development and testing & security sector, on permanent and contract basis, with offices in Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Düsseldorf and Munich.

• LMH Engineering
Specialized in recruiting Electrical and Mechanical Engineers within the industry, maritime and oil & gas sector, with offices in Amsterdam and Rotterdam.

So, why work for the Ambitious People Group?

It is our strategy and intention for continued growth, therefore we are looking for PHD’S (poor hungry and driven individuals) in sales who can help us, help themselves, achieve their ambition/dreams.

One of our goals is to become “employer of choice” rewarding our staff accordingly reflected in salary, commission and their incentives and rewards. Thereby we offer the best training opportunities within our market. If you want to realize your ambition, your next step is to pick up the phone and call us via +31 (0)20 570 81 28.

Candidate?

Go directly to your account and update your personal profile.

Vacancies

Are you looking for a job? Apply today!

Recommend a friend and earn €250,-

Do you know ambitious people in your network that we would be able to help in his or her career?

Successful candidates will enjoy:

• An ongoing training program
• Extremely competitive salary/commission structure
• Incentives/rewards (arguably the envy of the industry)
• Exceptional career opportunities including national and international

Working at Ambitious People Group means being part of a young, dynamic team on an exciting business adventure. Have a look at our vacancies or visit the corporate website of Ambitious People Group.

About Ambitious People Group

Who we are

In 2007, Ambitious People Group started on an attic in Amsterdam. By holding on to our motto “grow, grow, grow” we have built Ambitious People Group up
to what it is now: an International recruitment organization consisting of three recruitment brands; SAM Recruitment, Ardekay and LMH Engineering, with almost 100 employees in total and both national and international clients.

As it says in our name “Ambitious People” our key watchword is AMBITION; this is reflected by achieving various prestigious awards including the most successful award,
having achieved over thousand placements within more than thousand national/international organizations whilst creating exceptional long term ongoing business relationships.

Grow, grow, grow

We want to continue to grow, both nationally and internationally. Each of our recruitment agencies has its own specialism, this way we can offer our candidates and clients the best service and our consultants know exactly what is going on in the market. In the future, we want to continue to attract the best and most ambitious sales candidates for our recruitment brands. We invest in training our consultants to continue their development.

 

The core values of a career at Ambitious People Group are:

  • Ambition – ambition to reach the top and the drive and willingness to work hard to get there, are essential.
  • Success – we show our appreciation and recognition for your successes with an attractive bonus system and incentives for top performers.
  • Fun – we believe in a professional but informal atmosphere, where you enjoy your work and have fun with colleagues during and after work.

Are you ambitious and do you want to make a career? Please have a look at our jobs or contact our Corporate Recruiters and tell them why you want to build a career at Ambitious People Group.

Our Brands

Ambitious People Group believes in focus and specialization. This way, we can offer our candidates and clients the best possible service.
Therefore Ambitious People Group has three labels specialized in Sales and Marketing recruitment, IT recruitment and Engineering recruitment.

Sam Recruitment is specialized in recruiting Sales and Marketing professionals in the Netherlands and Belgium.

Since the founding in 2007 SAM Recruitment has grown to be the absolute market leader in the mediation of Sales and Marketing professionals. SAM Recruitment has offices in Amsterdam, Rotterdam and a satellite office in Antwerp.

Ardekay is specialized in IT recruitment within the architecture, design, development and testing & security sector, on permanent and contract basis, in the Netherlands and Germany.

Because of the focus of Ardekay on Java, .NET, PHP, SAP and Testing & Security professionals they can guarantee quality and thorough knowledge of the IT market. Ardekay has offices in Amsterdam, Rotterdam and Düsseldorf.

LMH Engineering is specialized in recruiting Electrical and Mechanical Engineers within the industry, maritime and oil & gas sector.

LMH Engineering was established in 2013 and has its office in Amsterdam and Rotterdam.

Awards and Milestones

By holding on to our motto “grow, grow, grow” we have build ambitious People Group up to

With these three recruitment brands we have achieved the following awards the past 7 years:

2015

FD Gazellen 5 times in a row

Ardekay has a second office in Germany. Munich opens its door.
LMH opens a office in Düsseldorf

High Growth Award

LMH opens a second office in Rotterdam

2013

FD Gazellen Award
High Growth Award
LMH Engineering is our third Recruitment label.

2012

FD Gazellen Award
High Growth Award

Recommend a friend

Being the Recruitment Consultant yourself? Ambitious People Group continues to grow nationally and internationally. This is why in the future, we want to attract the best and most ambitious people for Ambitious People Group and our labels; SAM Recruitment, Ardekay and LMH Engineering.
Do you know ambitious people in your network that we would be able to help in his or her career? ‘Recommend a friend’ and choose your gift worth €250,-.

More information

Read the conditions below or call us on +31 (0)20 5708128 and ask for Lilian van Riel, Manager Corporate Recruitment.

Terms and conditions:

• Email the name and contact details to recommend@ambitiouspeople.com.
• The person is not yet known at Ambitious People Group and all her affiliated companies.
• The individual successfully completes the probation time of a month.
• One of the above gift choices worth €250,-.

Ambitious People Group has the right to adjust the rules unilaterally.

Corporate Responsibility

Responsibility and Charity

Besides finding the perfect jobs, we truly believe that we can give something back to the community.

Ambitious People Group donates part of their monthly revenue to several local charities in the countries were we are located.

Our employees have given employability workshops and training to help young people improve their sales skills and build confidence for future employment.

Do you want to be a part of this programme? Then email marketing@ambitiouspeople.com

Efficiency

We continue to make efficiency improvements to reduce our environmental footprint.

– We reduced our power consumption by 50% in 2014.
– We use video tools for internal management meetings and job interviews.
– All of our recruiters use their bike or public transport card to go to work. We don’t have any parking space!
– All of are company flights are booked with the Climate Neutral Group to reduce CO2 emissions.

Do you have any advice? : let us know

Departments

Under the Ambitious People Group umbrella we currently have three specialist recruitment brands:

• SAM Recruitment, specialized in recruiting Sales and Marketing professionals in the Netherlands and Belgium.
• Ardekay, specialized in IT recruitment within the architecture, design, development and testing & security sector, on permanent and contract basis, in the Netherlands and Germany.
• LMH Engineering, specialized in recruiting Electrical and Mechanical Engineers within the industry, maritime and oil & gas sector.

Ambitious People Group also consists out of some supporting departments. Click on a department below to read more about the department.

Directly go to

Corporate Recruitment – Do you want to work at Ambitious People Group? Contact our Corporate Recruiters!

Finance & Legal – Contact our Finance & Legal department for financial and legal issues

Marketing & ICT – The Marketing & ICT department is responsible for the quality of the processes at Ambitious People Group

Office Management & Facilities – Office Management & PA makes sure the business runs smooth.

Senior Management & Board – Meet our Management and Board

Senior Management & Board

As the board of Ambitious People Group we are responsible for the vision, strategy, policies and management of
our management team. With a great ambition to grow and high flexibility, we constantly find opportunities in the market and
are not afraid to react on them. In the Netherlands Ambitious People Group keeps on growing and therefore we especially
see international expansion as a great opportunity and challenge for the future.

In our daily activities, we are supported by the Office Manager. She also serves as our first point of contact.

Therefore please call our PA at +31 (0) 20 570 8123 for any questions or comments you might have.

Dennis Grefkens

– Managing Director

What does Ambitious People Group mean to me? I am proud! Proud of what we have achieved so far: in seven years Ambitious People Group has grown as a recruitment organization and provides a job for almost 100 colleagues. Proud of our recruitment
brands…

Richard Houtman

– Non-Executive Director

By now I can say that I am an expert within the recruitment world. During my life, I have gained 30 years of sales experience and worked within international functions, like my job as Managing Director of Computer Futures (SThree). At this moment I have a few advising roles within different companies.

Jurgen Heerink

– Group Sales Director

 After successfully finishing my study Management Economics & Law, I immediately started working in Recruitment. After almost 4 years experiences within the different labels of Ambitious People Group I am now responsible for all the perm divisions of all labels of Ambitious People Group in the role of Sales Director.

Awards and Milestones

what it is now: a international recruitment organization consisting of three recruitment brands.

With these three recruitment brands we have achieved the following awards the past 7 years:

2015

FD Gazellen 5 times in a row

LMH opens a second office in Rotterdam

Wie is Ardekay?

Ardekay is gespecialiseerd in IT Recruitment. Door onze specifieke focus op Java, PHP, .NET, SAP, BI en Testing & Securityprofessionals op zowel permanente als contract basis, garanderen wij kwaliteit en grondige kennis van de markt. Onze Recruitment Consultants werken in toegewijde teams om te zorgen voor een hoog kwaliteitsniveau. Wij bouwen bruggen tussen bedrijven en mensen en onderhouden constant ons extensieve netwerk om zo tot de beste resultaten te komen.

  • Ik wil meer weten over Ardekay

Waar kan je ons vinden?

Ardekay heeft kantoren in Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Düsseldorf en München en bedient de Nederlandse en Duitse markt, maar we opereren ook buiten deze landsgrenzen.

  • Kom in contact met Ardekay

Wie werkt er voor Ardekay?

We combineren ervaring met eagerness. We hebben 25 jaar in-house IT recruitment ervaring. Onze consultants zijn gedreven professionals die voor jou the extra mile willen gaan.

  • Leer de Ardekay consultants kennen

Join the Ardekay journey?

Wil jij een kickstart geven aan je carriere? Kom bij ons werken. We staan altijd open voor getalenteerde professionals met een drive naar succes. Herken jij jezelf hierin?

  • Werken bij Ardekay

LMH Engineering – The Recruitment Engineers

LMH Engineering is gespecialiseerd in bemiddeling van Electrical & Mechanical Engineers in de Machinebouw, Maritiem, Oil&Gasen Offshoresector. Binnen de Maritiem, Oil & gas en Offshore focussen wij ons tevens op de engineers met een civieleachtergrond. Onze gedreven en gespecialiseerde Recruitment Consultants gaan voor jou proactief op zoek naar de vacature die je op het lijf geschreven is. Ons motto is: ‘We care, we deliver, we succeed’.

Bij LMH Engineering kijken we verder dan je CV. We kijken niet alleen naar je werkervaring, maar ook naar je persoonlijkheid en je carrière. Door onze persoonlijke begeleiding en specialisatie in Industrie, Maritiem en Oil & Gas bieden we je service op maat. Zodoende helpen we je niet aan een nieuwe baan, maar aan de volgende stap in je carrière!

Kijk voor meer informatie op de website www.lmhengineering.com

SAM = Sales & Marketing

SAM Recruitment is sinds 2007 dé snelst groeiende landelijke specialist in Sales & Marketing recruitment. Door deze focus kunnen we de beste Sales & Marketing professionals en de sterkste merken tot ons netwerk rekenen.

Wij gaan een stap verder. Voor onze kandidaten, onze opdrachtgevers en onszelf. Door onze focus op Sales & Marketing professionals kunnen we wel stellen dat:

  • We over een ruime marktkennis beschikken: we begrijpen wat bedrijven zoeken
  • We dagelijks de beste kandidaten spreken: wij weten wat professionals willen en kunnen
  • Deze combinatie ons in staat stelt de beste match te maken

Bij SAM Recruitment werken gespecialiseerde teams van consultants op hun eigen niche. De ideale werkgever of collega vind je tenslotte niet zomaar op goed geluk. Daarvoor is kennis van de branche en van de professionals die erin werken op zijn zachtst gezegd een must.

Onze opdrachtgevers: sterke merken

Doordat wij de beste Sales & Marketing professionals tot ons netwerk kunnen rekenen, weten de sterkste merken in de markt ons te vinden. Ons porfolio van klanten en opdrachtgevers bevat verschillende marktleiders en nichespelers, zowel nationaal als internationaal.
Kijk voor meer informatio op onze website www.samrecruitment.nl

We are Ambitious People

Founded in 2007 Ambitious People Group has in a relatively short period of time grown into a successful specialized, international, recruitment consultancy currently employing over 70 staff.

As it says in our name “Ambitious People” our key watchword is AMBITION; this is reflected by achieving various prestigious awards including the most successful award, having achieved over thousand placements within more than thousand national/international organisations whilst creating exceptional long term ongoing business relationships.

Grow, grow, grow

We want to continue to grow, both nationally and internationally. Each of our recruitment agencies has its own specialism, this way we can offer our candidates and clients the best service and our consultants know exactly what is going on in the market

The core values of a career at Ambitious People Group are:

  • Ambition – ambition to reach the top and the drive and willingness to work hard to get there, are essential.
  • Success – we show our appreciation and recognition for your successes with an attractive bonus system and incentives for top performers.
  • Fun – we believe in a professional but informal atmosphere, where you enjoy your work and have fun with colleagues during and after work.

Under the Ambitious People Group umbrella we currently have three specialized recruitment brands; SAM Recruitment, Ardekay and LMH Engineering.

Company Overview 2014

About Ambitious People Group

Who we are

In 2007, Ambitious People Group started on an attic in Amsterdam. By holding on to our motto “grow, grow, grow” we have built Ambitious People Group up
to what it is now: an International recruitment organization consisting of three recruitment brands; SAM Recruitment, Ardekay and LMH Engineering, with almost 100 employees in total and both national and international clients.

As it says in our name “Ambitious People” our key watchword is AMBITION; this is reflected by achieving various prestigious awards including the most successful award,
having achieved over thousand placements within more than thousand national/international organizations whilst creating exceptional long term ongoing business relationships.

Grow, grow, grow

We want to continue to grow, both nationally and internationally. Each of our recruitment agencies has its own specialism, this way we can offer our candidates and clients the best service and our consultants know exactly what is going on in the market. In the future, we want to continue to attract the best and most ambitious sales candidates for our recruitment brands. We invest in training our consultants to continue their development.

 

The core values of a career at Ambitious People Group are:

  • Ambition – ambition to reach the top and the drive and willingness to work hard to get there, are essential.
  • Success – we show our appreciation and recognition for your successes with an attractive bonus system and incentives for top performers.
  • Fun – we believe in a professional but informal atmosphere, where you enjoy your work and have fun with colleagues during and after work.

Are you ambitious and do you want to make a career? Please have a look at our jobs or contact our Corporate Recruiters and tell them why you want to build a career at Ambitious People Group.

SAM = Sales & Marketing

SAM Recruitment is sinds 2007 dé snelst groeiende landelijke specialist in Sales & Marketing recruitment. Door deze focus kunnen we de beste Sales & Marketing professionals en de sterkste merken tot ons netwerk rekenen.

Wij gaan een stap verder. Voor onze kandidaten, onze opdrachtgevers en onszelf. Door onze focus op Sales & Marketing professionals kunnen we wel stellen dat:

  • We over een ruime marktkennis beschikken: we begrijpen wat bedrijven zoeken
  • We dagelijks de beste kandidaten spreken: wij weten wat professionals willen en kunnen
  • Deze combinatie ons in staat stelt de beste match te maken

Bij SAM Recruitment werken gespecialiseerde teams van consultants op hun eigen niche. De ideale werkgever of collega vind je tenslotte niet zomaar op goed geluk. Daarvoor is kennis van de branche en van de professionals die erin werken op zijn zachtst gezegd een must.

Onze opdrachtgevers: sterke merken

Doordat wij de beste Sales & Marketing professionals tot ons netwerk kunnen rekenen, weten de sterkste merken in de markt ons te vinden. Ons porfolio van klanten en opdrachtgevers bevat verschillende marktleiders en nichespelers, zowel nationaal als internationaal.
Kijk voor meer informatio op onze website www.samrecruitment.nl

Wie is Ardekay?

Ardekay is gespecialiseerd in IT Recruitment. Door onze specifieke focus op Java, PHP, .NET, SAP, BI en Testing & Securityprofessionals op zowel permanente als contract basis, garanderen wij kwaliteit en grondige kennis van de markt. Onze Recruitment Consultants werken in toegewijde teams om te zorgen voor een hoog kwaliteitsniveau. Wij bouwen bruggen tussen bedrijven en mensen en onderhouden constant ons extensieve netwerk om zo tot de beste resultaten te komen.

  • Ik wil meer weten over Ardekay

Waar kan je ons vinden?

Ardekay heeft kantoren in Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Düsseldorf en München en bedient de Nederlandse en Duitse markt, maar we opereren ook buiten deze landsgrenzen.

  • Kom in contact met Ardekay

Wie werkt er voor Ardekay?

We combineren ervaring met eagerness. We hebben 25 jaar in-house IT recruitment ervaring. Onze consultants zijn gedreven professionals die voor jou the extra mile willen gaan.

  • Leer de Ardekay consultants kennen

Join the Ardekay journey?

Wil jij een kickstart geven aan je carriere? Kom bij ons werken. We staan altijd open voor getalenteerde professionals met een drive naar succes. Herken jij jezelf hierin?

  • Werken bij Ardekay

LMH Engineering – The Recruitment Engineers

LMH Engineering is gespecialiseerd in bemiddeling van Electrical & Mechanical Engineers in de Machinebouw, Maritiem, Oil&Gasen Offshoresector. Binnen de Maritiem, Oil & gas en Offshore focussen wij ons tevens op de engineers met een civieleachtergrond. Onze gedreven en gespecialiseerde Recruitment Consultants gaan voor jou proactief op zoek naar de vacature die je op het lijf geschreven is. Ons motto is: ‘We care, we deliver, we succeed’.

Bij LMH Engineering kijken we verder dan je CV. We kijken niet alleen naar je werkervaring, maar ook naar je persoonlijkheid en je carrière. Door onze persoonlijke begeleiding en specialisatie in Industrie, Maritiem en Oil & Gas bieden we je service op maat. Zodoende helpen we je niet aan een nieuwe baan, maar aan de volgende stap in je carrière!

Kijk voor meer informatie op de website www.lmhengineering.com

Our Brands

Ambitious People Group believes in focus and specialization. This way, we can offer our candidates and clients the best possible service.
Therefore Ambitious People Group has three labels specialized in Sales and Marketing recruitment, IT recruitment and Engineering recruitment.

Sam Recruitment is specialized in recruiting Sales and Marketing professionals in the Netherlands and Belgium.

Since the founding in 2007 SAM Recruitment has grown to be the absolute market leader in the mediation of Sales and Marketing professionals. SAM Recruitment has offices in Amsterdam, Rotterdam and a satellite office in Antwerp.

Ardekay is specialized in IT recruitment within the architecture, design, development and testing & security sector, on permanent and contract basis, in the Netherlands and Germany.

Because of the focus of Ardekay on Java, .NET, PHP, SAP and Testing & Security professionals they can guarantee quality and thorough knowledge of the IT market. Ardekay has offices in Amsterdam, Rotterdam and Düsseldorf.

LMH Engineering is specialized in recruiting Electrical and Mechanical Engineers within the industry, maritime and oil & gas sector.

LMH Engineering was established in 2013 and has its office in Amsterdam and Rotterdam.

Jurgen Heerink – Sales Director Permanent Divisions

How long have you been working at Ambitious People Group and what has been your career path?

I have been working for Ambitious People Group for 4 years already. I started as a Trainee Recruitment Consultant at Sam Recruitment, then I became Recruitment Consultant, Senior Recruitment Consultant, Team Leader, Sales Manager Amsterdam, Sales Manager Amsterdam and Den Bosch, Country Manager (Amsterdam, Den Bosch, Rotterdam), Group Manager LMH Engineering before taking on the next step to Sales Director Permanent Divisions.

Where do you want to be in five years?

In the coming years we will open more offices in the Netherlands, and we will also be expanding abroad. I will have the final responsibility in this process and I will do everything to make it a success; an even bigger success than anticipated.

What is the highlight for you so far?

My biggest highlight so far is that I have been able to develop in such a way the past years, that I am now able to set up a new company and bring the Ambitious People Group to a success.

Lilian van Riel – Manager Corporate Recruitment Ambitious People Group

What is your role within Ambitious People Group?

In my role I am responsible for the Corporate Recruitment department for the entire group and all its affiliated brands.

What is your background in terms of experience and training?

I have a university degree in Language and Communication Studies. A very interesting study, but it is such a broad field of education that you really have no idea which way to go when you’re done. What I did know, was that I was looking for a more commercial role. Ambitious People approached me in 2010 for the position of Recruitment Consultant. This was exactly the right match at that moment. I started as a Trainee Recruitment Consultant and have made several promotions to Principal Recruitment Consultant and Senior Recruitment Consultant. After 3,5 years of sales, I decided that I wanted to do something different. For that reason, I was approached by the board for this job and I now fill the position of Manager Corporate Recruitment.

What is your highlight so far within Ambitious People Group?

Setting up my own corporate recruitment department.

What are your ambitions?

My department will have to grow when the organization continues to grow the pace it is doing now. We are now with a team of three, but with the plans we have there should be an entire department with more Resourcers focusing on international positions in the future. I always see myself as a working foreman with the final responsibility for Corporate Recruitment and HR, both nationally and internationally. So, my business card will soon be entitled Global Corporate Recruitment and HR Director.

Recommend a friend

Being the Recruitment Consultant yourself? Ambitious People Group continues to grow nationally and internationally. This is why in the future, we want to attract the best and most ambitious people for Ambitious People Group and our labels; SAM Recruitment, Ardekay and LMH Engineering.
Do you know ambitious people in your network that we would be able to help in his or her career? ‘Recommend a friend’ and choose your gift worth €250,-.

More information

Read the conditions below or call us on +31 (0)20 5708128 and ask for Lilian van Riel, Manager Corporate Recruitment.

Terms and conditions:

• Email the name and contact details to recommend@ambitiouspeople.com.
• The person is not yet known at Ambitious People Group and all her affiliated companies.
• The individual successfully completes the probation time of a month.
• One of the above gift choices worth €250,-.

Ambitious People Group has the right to adjust the rules unilaterally.

Corporate Responsibility

Responsibility and Charity

Besides finding the perfect jobs, we truly believe that we can give something back to the community.

Ambitious People Group donates part of their monthly revenue to several local charities in the countries were we are located.

Our employees have given employability workshops and training to help young people improve their sales skills and build confidence for future employment.

Do you want to be a part of this programme? Then email marketing@ambitiouspeople.com

Efficiency

We continue to make efficiency improvements to reduce our environmental footprint.

– We reduced our power consumption by 50% in 2014.
– We use video tools for internal management meetings and job interviews.
– All of our recruiters use their bike or public transport card to go to work. We don’t have any parking space!
– All of are company flights are booked with the Climate Neutral Group to reduce CO2 emissions.

Do you have any advice? : let us know

Departments

Under the Ambitious People Group umbrella we currently have three specialist recruitment brands:

• SAM Recruitment, specialized in recruiting Sales and Marketing professionals in the Netherlands and Belgium.
• Ardekay, specialized in IT recruitment within the architecture, design, development and testing & security sector, on permanent and contract basis, in the Netherlands and Germany.
• LMH Engineering, specialized in recruiting Electrical and Mechanical Engineers within the industry, maritime and oil & gas sector.

Ambitious People Group also consists out of some supporting departments. Click on a department below to read more about the department.

Directly go to

Corporate Recruitment – Do you want to work at Ambitious People Group? Contact our Corporate Recruiters!

Finance & Legal – Contact our Finance & Legal department for financial and legal issues

Marketing & ICT – The Marketing & ICT department is responsible for the quality of the processes at Ambitious People Group

Office Management & Facilities – Office Management & PA makes sure the business runs smooth.

Senior Management & Board – Meet our Management and Board

Senior Management & Board

As the board of Ambitious People Group we are responsible for the vision, strategy, policies and management of
our management team. With a great ambition to grow and high flexibility, we constantly find opportunities in the market and
are not afraid to react on them. In the Netherlands Ambitious People Group keeps on growing and therefore we especially
see international expansion as a great opportunity and challenge for the future.

In our daily activities, we are supported by the Office Manager. She also serves as our first point of contact.

Therefore please call our PA at +31 (0) 20 570 8123 for any questions or comments you might have.

Dennis Grefkens

– Managing Director

What does Ambitious People Group mean to me? I am proud! Proud of what we have achieved so far: in seven years Ambitious People Group has grown as a recruitment organization and provides a job for almost 100 colleagues. Proud of our recruitment
brands…

Richard Houtman

– Non-Executive Director

By now I can say that I am an expert within the recruitment world. During my life, I have gained 30 years of sales experience and worked within international functions, like my job as Managing Director of Computer Futures (SThree). At this moment I have a few advising roles within different companies.

Jurgen Heerink

– Group Sales Director

 After successfully finishing my study Management Economics & Law, I immediately started working in Recruitment. After almost 4 years experiences within the different labels of Ambitious People Group I am now responsible for all the perm divisions of all labels of Ambitious People Group in the role of Sales Director.

Wie is Ardekay?

Ardekay is gespecialiseerd in IT Recruitment. Door onze specifieke focus op Java, PHP, .NET, SAP, BI en Testing & Securityprofessionals op zowel permanente als contract basis, garanderen wij kwaliteit en grondige kennis van de markt. Onze Recruitment Consultants werken in toegewijde teams om te zorgen voor een hoog kwaliteitsniveau. Wij bouwen bruggen tussen bedrijven en mensen en onderhouden constant ons extensieve netwerk om zo tot de beste resultaten te komen.

  • Ik wil meer weten over Ardekay

Waar kan je ons vinden?

Ardekay heeft kantoren in Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Düsseldorf en München en bedient de Nederlandse en Duitse markt, maar we opereren ook buiten deze landsgrenzen.

  • Kom in contact met Ardekay

Wie werkt er voor Ardekay?

We combineren ervaring met eagerness. We hebben 25 jaar in-house IT recruitment ervaring. Onze consultants zijn gedreven professionals die voor jou the extra mile willen gaan.

  • Leer de Ardekay consultants kennen

Join the Ardekay journey?

Wil jij een kickstart geven aan je carriere? Kom bij ons werken. We staan altijd open voor getalenteerde professionals met een drive naar succes. Herken jij jezelf hierin?

  • Werken bij Ardekay

LMH Engineering – The Recruitment Engineers

LMH Engineering is gespecialiseerd in bemiddeling van Electrical & Mechanical Engineers in de Machinebouw, Maritiem, Oil&Gasen Offshoresector. Binnen de Maritiem, Oil & gas en Offshore focussen wij ons tevens op de engineers met een civieleachtergrond. Onze gedreven en gespecialiseerde Recruitment Consultants gaan voor jou proactief op zoek naar de vacature die je op het lijf geschreven is. Ons motto is: ‘We care, we deliver, we succeed’.

Bij LMH Engineering kijken we verder dan je CV. We kijken niet alleen naar je werkervaring, maar ook naar je persoonlijkheid en je carrière. Door onze persoonlijke begeleiding en specialisatie in Industrie, Maritiem en Oil & Gas bieden we je service op maat. Zodoende helpen we je niet aan een nieuwe baan, maar aan de volgende stap in je carrière!

Kijk voor meer informatie op de website www.lmhengineering.com

SAM = Sales & Marketing

SAM Recruitment is sinds 2007 dé snelst groeiende landelijke specialist in Sales & Marketing recruitment. Door deze focus kunnen we de beste Sales & Marketing professionals en de sterkste merken tot ons netwerk rekenen.

Wij gaan een stap verder. Voor onze kandidaten, onze opdrachtgevers en onszelf. Door onze focus op Sales & Marketing professionals kunnen we wel stellen dat:

  • We over een ruime marktkennis beschikken: we begrijpen wat bedrijven zoeken
  • We dagelijks de beste kandidaten spreken: wij weten wat professionals willen en kunnen
  • Deze combinatie ons in staat stelt de beste match te maken

Bij SAM Recruitment werken gespecialiseerde teams van consultants op hun eigen niche. De ideale werkgever of collega vind je tenslotte niet zomaar op goed geluk. Daarvoor is kennis van de branche en van de professionals die erin werken op zijn zachtst gezegd een must.

Onze opdrachtgevers: sterke merken

Doordat wij de beste Sales & Marketing professionals tot ons netwerk kunnen rekenen, weten de sterkste merken in de markt ons te vinden. Ons porfolio van klanten en opdrachtgevers bevat verschillende marktleiders en nichespelers, zowel nationaal als internationaal.
Kijk voor meer informatio op onze website www.samrecruitment.nl

We are Ambitious People

Founded in 2007 Ambitious People Group has in a relatively short period of time grown into a successful specialized, international, recruitment consultancy currently employing over 70 staff.

As it says in our name “Ambitious People” our key watchword is AMBITION; this is reflected by achieving various prestigious awards including the most successful award, having achieved over thousand placements within more than thousand national/international organisations whilst creating exceptional long term ongoing business relationships.

Grow, grow, grow

We want to continue to grow, both nationally and internationally. Each of our recruitment agencies has its own specialism, this way we can offer our candidates and clients the best service and our consultants know exactly what is going on in the market

The core values of a career at Ambitious People Group are:

  • Ambition – ambition to reach the top and the drive and willingness to work hard to get there, are essential.
  • Success – we show our appreciation and recognition for your successes with an attractive bonus system and incentives for top performers.
  • Fun – we believe in a professional but informal atmosphere, where you enjoy your work and have fun with colleagues during and after work.

Under the Ambitious People Group umbrella we currently have three specialized recruitment brands; SAM Recruitment, Ardekay and LMH Engineering.

Company Overview 2014
